items.name: event_1
items.label: Leave Limgrave, light a bonfire in Liurnia/Caelid/Beyond

items.name: event_2
items.label: Visit Roundtable Hold

items.name: event_3
items.label: Kill Godrick the Grafted

items.name: event_4
items.label: Aquire a second Great Rune

items.name: event_5
items.label: Kill Rennala

items.name: event_6
items.label: Visit Volcano Manor

items.name: event_7
items.label: Complete the Volcano Manor Questline

items.name: event_8
items.label: Kill Rykard

items.name: event_9
items.label: Visit Mohgwyn's Palace

items.name: event_10
items.label: Reach the Altus Plataeu

items.name: event_11
items.label: Reach the Royal Capital

items.name: event_12
items.label: Enter the Academy of Raya Lucaria

items.name: event_13
items.label: Kill Morgott

items.name: event_14
items.label: Reach the Mountaintops of the Giants

items.name: event_15
items.label: Kill the Fire Giant

items.name: event_16
items.label: Reach Crumbling Farum Azula

items.name: event_17
items.label: Kill Maliketh, The Black Blade

items.name: item_roderika_1
items.label: Meet Roderika at the Stormhill Shack

items.name: item_roderika_2
items.label: Find the Chrysalid's Memento deep in Stormveil Castle

items.name: item_roderika_3
items.label: Return the Memento to Roderika

items.name: item_roderika_4
items.label: Go to Roderika's previous location at Stormhill Shack

items.name: item_roderika_5
items.label: Talk to Rodericka and Master Hewg until she moves to sitting near him

items.name: item_roderika_6
items.label: Go back to where you found the Memento for a Crimson Hood

items.name: item_boc_1
items.label: Hit the talking tree and talk to Boc

items.name: item_boc_2
items.label: Go to Coastal Cave, talk to Boc

items.name: item_boc_3
items.label: Kill the boss and return the Sewing Needle to Boc

items.name: item_boc_4
items.label: Meet Boc next to the the Lake-Facing Cliffs Grace and talk to him

items.name: item_boc_5
items.label: Grab the Gold Sewing Needle from the Church of Vows

items.name: item_boc_6
items.label: Buy a piece of boss gear from Enia, and give the Gold Needle to Boc

items.name: item_boc_7
items.label: Meet Boc at the East Capital Rampart in Leyndell Royal Capital

items.name: item_boc_8
items.label: Talk to Boc until he says he is ugly, offer him a Larval Tear

items.name: item_boc_9
items.label: Talk to Boc in Renalla's boss room, reload the area again to find him dead

items.name: item_boc_10
items.label: Visit Hermit Village to find the Prattling-Pate: You're Beautiful

items.name: item_boc_11
items.label: Talk to Boc until he says he is ugly, use the Prattling-Pate: You're Beautiful

items.name: item_varre_1
items.label: Talk to White Faced Varre by the First Step

items.name: item_varre_2
items.label: Talk to White Faced Varre at Rose Church and recieve Festering Bloody Fingers

items.name: item_varre_3
items.label: Invade three players

items.name: item_varre_4
items.label: Return to Varre to recieve the Lord of Blood's Favor

items.name: item_varre_5
items.label: Interact with the corpse at the Church of Inhibition or the corpse at Chapel of Anticipation

items.name: item_varre_6
items.label: Return to Varre to gain the Bloody Finger and the Pureblood Knights Medal

items.name: item_varre_7
items.label: Kill the invader in Mohgwyn's Palace three times

items.name: item_varre_8
items.label: Duel White Faced Varre

items.name: item_thops_1
items.label: Talk to Thops in the Church of Irith

items.name: item_thops_2
items.label: Find the spare Glintstone Key on top of a Chandelier in the Church of the Cuckoo's inside of the Academy

items.name: item_thops_3
items.label: Return to Thops and give him the Glintstone Key

items.name: item_thops_4
items.label: Travel to Schoolhouse Classroom Grace in the Academy and loot Thops's body just outside and around the corner

items.name: item_gurranq_1
items.label: Go North of the Third Church of Marika and into the water to find a Sending Gate. Use it to find the Bestial Sanctum and talk to Gurranq

items.name: item_gurranq_2
items.label: Give Gurranq 4 deathroots

items.name: item_gurranq_3
items.label: Return to the Bestial Sanctum and subdue Gurranq

items.name: item_gurranq_4
items.label: Give Gurranq 5 more deathroots, for a total of 9

items.name: item_corhyn_1
items.label: Talk to Corhyn in Roundtable Hold

items.name: item_corhyn_2
items.label: Jump off the balcony in Roundtable Hold and kill Mad Tongue Alberich

items.name: item_corhyn_3
items.label: Talk to Brother Corhyn and he will announce he is leaving

items.name: item_corhyn_4
items.label: Talk to Brother Corhyn on the Altus Junction

items.name: item_corhyn_5
items.label: Talk to Goldmask

items.name: item_corhyn_6
items.label: Return to Corhyn and tell him of Goldmasks whereabouts

items.name: item_corhyn_7
items.label: Return to Goldmask to find Corhyn by his side

items.name: item_corhyn_8
items.label: Talk to Corhyn and Goldmask in hill near West Capital Rampart

items.name: item_corhyn_9
items.label: Find the Golden Order Principia and give it to Corhyn or Miriel to learn the Law of Regression

items.name: item_corhyn_10
items.label: Travel West of the Erdtree Sanctuary Grace and down an elevator and stairs to find a message on the ground. Stand on the message and face the statue then cast Law of Regression. Touch the newly formed message then talk to Goldmask and Corhyn.

items.name: item_corhyn_11
items.label: Travel to the Stargazer's Ruins in the North section of the Mountaintops of the Giants and talk to Corhyn and Goldmask

items.name: item_corhyn_12
items.label: Find the corpse of Goldmask on the West side of Erdtree Sanctuary Grace, past a few plants for the Mending Rune of Perfect Order. Reload and check Goldmask again for his armor. Corhyn can be found on the bridge near Stargazer Ruins, kill him for his armor and weapon
